item.title: SuperLogin 1.00 by Shahar Avain
item.dc:creator: @Shahar_Avain Shahar Avain
item.description:
@Shahar_Avain wrote:

This is cool. This clicks the start menu, opens IE, goes to runescape.com, goes to through everything, THIS IS LOW DETAIL MEMBERS BTW, and types ur username and pass and clicks login. NOTE: Your IE setup needs to be like this, along with you start menu needs to be Windows XP Style.

ALSO, you Internet Explorer needs to be #1 on the start menu thing.

[code]
program SuperLogin;
{made by Shahar Avain}
{haven’t yet incountered a flaw}
{READ THE POST ON MOPARISTHEBEST FOR INSTRUCTIONS}

const
Message1 = ‘USERNAME HERE’;
Message2 = ‘PASSWORD HERE’;
Message3 = ‘www.runescape.com’;

procedure Login;
begin
movemousesmooth(14,13);
wait(500);
clickmouse(14,13,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(62,115);
wait(500);
clickmouse(62,115,true);
wait(2000);
movemousesmooth(271,102);
wait(500);
clickmouse(271,102,true);
wait(500);
sendkeys(message3);
wait(1000);
sendkeysVB(’{ENTER}’,false);
wait(10000);
movemousesmooth(666,395);
wait(500);
clickmouse(666,396,true);
wait(10000)
movemousesmooth(613,400)
wait(500);
clickmouse(613,400,true);
wait(10000);
movemousesmooth(654,343);
wait(500)
clickmouse(654,343,true);
wait(20000);
movemousesmooth(481,439);
wait(500);
clickmouse(481,439,true);
wait(500);
movemousesmooth(409,401);
wait(500);
clickmouse(409,401,true);
sendkeys(message1);
wait(2000);
sendkeysVB(’{ENTER}’,false);
wait(1000);
sendkeys(message2);
wait(1500);
movemousesmooth(329,467);
wait(500);
clickmouse(329,467,true);
end;

begin
Login;
end.[/code]
Put your username in ‘USERNAME HERE’
Put your password in ‘PASSWORD HERE’
NOTE!!! Whether it works or not MAY be affected by your screen res. If not, change res to 800x600. You get a bigger RS Screen anyway.

Read full topic
